RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $ 5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PASSION TO PLEASE was up close early, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was much the best. BIG BANG BLUE was off the pace, had a mild gain on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was clearly second best. VERI UNIFIED was in range and a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. JUNGLE TIGRESS was well back and saved ground on the turn but was no real threat. FOREST CHOICE was away alertly and raced evenly on the turn but weakened through the stretch. VERMONT HOLIDAY was in touch but chased on the turn and faded through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Forest Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, evenly turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Passion to Please
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Jeff and McGirr Jr Herbert
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close early, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Jungle Tigress
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, saved ground turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bang Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Vermont Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, chased turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Veri Unified
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, factor turn, 4-path stretch, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Maiden Or Claiming Since June 16 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALACRITOUS was away alertly, forced the pace on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. TAKE A CHANCE was hustled early and had a slim lead on the turn but was second best in a good effort. STORMING LADY was in touch and a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch evened out. CORE was unhurried early and hustled along on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch needed more. VENOMOUS STATE was in range and roused on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was all out.

ENTRY.NAME: Take a Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, 2nd best, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Alacritous
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Core
ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, hustled along turn, 5-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Venomous State
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, 3-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Storming Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor turn, 4-path stretch, evened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race at a Mile or Over Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5 ,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEELING stalked the early leader, had the lead on the far turn, vied through the stretch and fought gamely for the win. TIMMINS was in touch, a factor on the far turn and had the lead from the four path in mid stretch but was outgunned. BIG BROWN BREWSKII was unhurried early and raced evenly on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. IRIE ISLAND MAN set the pace but was headed on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch gave way. QUIET REBEL was off the pace and saved ground on the far turn but was not a factor. FOUR BOUNCE was in range early but trailed the field on the far turn and was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Four Bounce
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range early, trailed far turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, led far turn, vied stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Irie Island Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, headed far turn, 3-path stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Rebel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground far turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Timmins
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor far turn, led 4-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brown Brewskii
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, evenly far turn, 5-path stretch, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 21600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). I f deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VERY DEBONAIRE showed speed from the inside, had the lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch prevailed. PRINCE FOR A DAY was in touch, raced evenly on the turn and vied through the stretch but just missed. RELOAD BULLET was away alertly and forced the pace on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was all out. MISS D'S PRIDE was in mid pack and had a good position on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch leveled off. FIRST ROUND was off the pace and had a mild gain on the turn but needed more. RED ZEPPELIN was in range and roused on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no response. BEYOND TALENTED was unhurried early, showed little and was no threat. CHICAGO FREDDY broke poorly, trailed the field on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Very Debonaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, led turn, 3-path stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Miss D's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, good position turn, 4-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Reload Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, 4-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Talented
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, showed little, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Prince for a Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, vied stretch, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Chicago Freddy
ENTRY.OWNER: Princeton Farms Inc Ham Nelson and Bechtal Glenn
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke poorly, trailed turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: First Round
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Red Zeppelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, 5-path stretch, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders A wards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANT BEAT THE KATZ set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. ZAFEATHER tracked the leaders and was a factor on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. MY GIRL GABBY was off slow and was roused on the turn but finished evenly. NICOLE'S SONG broke outward, trailed the field on the turn and passed tired foes through the stretch. AWILDAS TREASURE was in range and raced evenly on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch weakened. CALL ME BROOKE was in touch and hustled along on the turn but failed to fire.

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Gabby
ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, roused turn, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Beat the Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Brooke
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along turn, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Zafeather
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, factor turn, 5-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Awildas Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Nicole's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, trailed turn, passed tired foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 7F Turf CR: 76. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited to 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontar io Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILBERFORCE set the pace, had the lead on the far turn and with mild pressure through the stretch proved best. WORKIN OUT tracked the early leaders, was a factor on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was clearly second best. SENSIBLE PORTIONS stalked the early leader, raced evenly on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch held show. SYNCHROMESH was off slow and gained ground on the far turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was all out. DYNAMIC MISSION was in range but trailed the field on the far turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch had no rally. ACTION POINT was off the pace and had a mild gain on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was not a factor. ARTIE'S ALL IN was in touch and hustled along on the far turn but had no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Workin Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamic Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, trailed far turn, 7-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Wilberforce
ENTRY.OWNER: Beharry Vinodh H and Ceccato Sharon
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led far turn, mild pressure stretch, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Edward Seltzer, Beverly Anderson,Krista Seltzer & Jamie Fr

ENTRY.NAME: Artie's All In
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along far turn, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Action Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain far turn, 5-path stretch, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Synchromesh
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, gained ground far turn, 6-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Sensible Portions
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, evenly far turn, 4-path stretch, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SNELL FLICKA set a pressured pace, had the lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch fought gamely for the win. REMEMBEROLDTYMES was in range, moved up on the turn and had a bid from the six path at the top of the stretch but was second best. SUBZERO PLUS showed no speed, had a mild gain on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was up for show. REIGN BY REIN was in mid pack and saved ground on the turn but needed more. MS. P'S BELLA was in touch and raced evenly on the turn but leveled off. WEST PAW was off the pace and trailed the field on the turn but passed tired foes through the stretch. J M R BOLD VISION settled off the pace and was roused on the turn but had no response. FUN COOL was off slow and hustled along on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch weakened. JUNGLE GODDESS forced the early pace and dueled on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Reign by Rein
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, saved ground turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Snell Flicka
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, led turn, 3-path stretch, fought gamely

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Brent Fernung, Crystal Fernung & Andrew Fernung

ENTRY.NAME: J M R Bold Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, roused turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Jungle Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled turn, 4-path stretch, empty

ENTRY.NAME: West Paw
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed turn, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. P's Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberoldtymes
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, moved up turn, bid 6-path stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Fun Cool
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, hustled along turn, 7-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Subzero Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, mild gain turn, 5-path stretch, up for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 82. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNION COLONEL was hustled early, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch held sway. EXCEED was unhurried early, saved ground on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch rallied late. BOUND LUCKY was in range, had a mild gain on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was up for show. ACE DESTROYER was in touch and a factor on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off. WONNEFRAC was up close and raced evenly from the inside on the turn but had no late kick. BEN LOMOND was well back and closed the gap on the turn but from the eight path at the top of the stretch had no impact. RED MAPLE was away alertly but in tight going into the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch weakened. TORPEDO MAX was off the pace and roused on the turn but was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Wonnefrac
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, evenly inside turn, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ben Lomond
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap turn, 8-path stretch, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Exceed
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground turn, 7-path stretch, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Red Maple
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, in tight turn, 4-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bound Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, mild gain turn, 5-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Ace Destroyer
ENTRY.OWNER: Radcliffe Racing Stable and Admiral Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor turn, 5-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Torpedo Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, roused turn, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Union Colonel
ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, held sway
